presentationColumns.name: Journal Debit Amount (Accounted)
presentationColumns.description: Shows the sum of debit journal entries amount for specified accounts.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL SLA Reconciliation.Journal Debit Amount (Accounted)

presentationColumns.name: Journal Credit Amount (Accounted)
presentationColumns.description: Shows the sum of credit journal entries amount for specified accounts.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL SLA Reconciliation.Journal Credit Amount (Accounted)

presentationColumns.name: Journal Net Amount (Accounted)
presentationColumns.description: Shows the activity amount of the specified accounts. Where Activity Amount = Sum of Journal Debit Amount (Accounted) - Sum of Journal Credit Amount (Accounted).
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL SLA Reconciliation.Journal Net Amount (Accounted)
